name: Pork
description: Pork the bonk killer | Community driven web3 token. Pork is a community-driven meme cryptocurrency on Solana Chain. Our contract is fully renounced, we have zero tax on buys and sells. Investors can confidently participate in this revolutionary project knowing the liquidity has been burned, and ownership is renounced. preventing the chances of a rug pull. At Pork , we are exceptionally proud of the community that is being built surrounding our token. We work to provide engagement through our social media pages, as well as timely announcements, and transparency as the company develops.
